output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount' variable.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control for 'frozenAccount'.
transfer function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control for 'frozenAccount'.
mintToken function generates predictable pseudo-random tokens, allowing attackers to manipulate token supply.
